text:
Is Cher concerned Chaz Bono will die from his weight issues? That’s the claim from one of this week’s tabloids. Gossip Cop can reveal the truth. According to the National Enquirer, Bono’s “mammoth weight swings, endless overindulgences and gender reassignment medications are killing him,” leaving a “fearful” Cher concerned over his poor health. A so-called […]

title: Cher Not Worried Chaz Bono Will Die From Weight Issues, Despite Fake News Story
